title: Zuckerberg's $50M donation to California may be his 'parting gift' to the State
description: Mark Zuckerberg is reportedly making significant investments in Sacramento, California, while simultaneously acquiring a lavish Miami mansion. This move, alongside other tech titans like Larry Page and Sergey Brin relocating to Florida, is fueled by California's proposed Billionaire Tax Act. The potential 5% tax on net worth exceeding $1 billion could cost Zuckerberg billions, prompting a westward exodus.

title: ‘India moved faster in ripping China out of social media apps’: Biden-era official
India eyes diversification: Goyal says would 'love' high-quality coal from US
description: Piyush Goyal said India is looking to broaden its sourcing of crude oil and coking coal and would welcome supplies of premium-quality coking coal from the United States.

title: Centre to bring 1,954 border villages under development scheme
description: Vibrant Village Programme, originally aimed at areas along China border, will now be launched in villages along  Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh, Bhutan, and Myanmar also

title: U.S. energy chief says IEA must 'drop' focus on climate change
description: Chris Wright threatened last year to pull the United States out of the IEA — which was founded to coordinate responses to major disruptions of supplies after the 1973 oil crisis — unless it reformed the way it operates.

title: "I was genuinely not expecting this..": Foreigner blown away by IRCTC Thali
description: A foreign traveler's delighted reaction to a full meal served on an Indian train has gone viral, challenging preconceptions about railway food.  The content creator praised the quality and variety of the vegetarian thali, including rice, dal, paneer, and dessert.  This highlights the impressive hospitality managed by IRCTC on select long-distance journeys.

title: Rashee Rice faces $1M lawsuit over domestic violence claim
description: Kansas City Chiefs player Rashee Rice is now facing a major civil lawsuit. His former partner Dacoda Jones has filed a case seeking over one million dollars. She alleges a pattern of domestic violence over nearly two years. The NFL is investigating these serious claims. Rice is already on probation from a previous incident.

title: Allu Arjun's Hyderabad Mansion: Design meets luxury; 8,000 sq ft home in Jubilee Hills
description: Allu Arjun's Rs 100 crore Jubilee Hills mansion is a stunning, minimalist, all-white 'box-shaped' home. Spanning 8,000 sq ft on two acres, it features sunlit living spaces, a cozy family area, and a modern kitchen. The property also boasts vibrant children's rooms and a relaxing poolside, reflecting the 'Pushpa' star's love for peaceful, stylish living.

title: Best days in 2026 to take important decisions
description: In 2026, Saturn's influence encourages thoughtful, well-timed decisions rather than impulsive actions. Specific dates each month, from March to December, offer opportune moments for structured thinking, practical planning, and commitments that are likely to hold their ground and endure.

title: Google AI CEO tells everyone why Gemini & ChatGPT winning International Maths Olympiad is not big
description: Google AI CEO Demis Hassabis stated that AI systems solving complex Maths Olympiad problems do not prove general intelligence. These systems can still err on basic math and are 'frozen' after training. They struggle with long-term strategies and consistency across tasks. Hassabis emphasized the need for AI that learns continuously and plans for the future.

title: Golden State lands $60M Celtics center, ends Giannis pursuit
description: The Golden State Warriors have acquired Kristaps Porzingis from the Atlanta Hawks, trading away Jonathan Kuminga and Buddy Hield. This move aims to bolster the frontcourt and scoring after Jimmy Butler's season-ending injury. While Porzingis offers valuable spacing and shooting, his durability remains a significant concern for the team's playoff aspirations.

title: Ryan Williams, 19, announces engagement to Alexis Hill, 25
description: Alabama wide receiver Ryan Williams, 19, announced his engagement to 25-year-old Alexis Hill on Valentine’s Day. Hill, who has one child from a previous relationship, shared photos of her ring on Instagram. NFL insider Dov Kleiman reported the news on X, leading to mixed reactions online. Some fans celebrated, while others debated the couple’s six-year age gap.
